text: This the region where so many ships have recently been commandeered. They had "a large cache of weapons including 7 AK-47 rifles, a rocket propelled grenade launcher, and 3 machine guns. '' They are taking the vessels to pirate controlled regions in Somalia, with an estimated 1,500 pirates.
title: MSNBC is reporting that the Indian Navy claims they have captured 23 pirates in the Gulf of Aden.
